org.apache.juneau.utils

Class StringMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.utils.StringMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharSequence, Writable

    public class StringMessage
extends Object
implements CharSequence, Writable
    An encapsulated MessageFormat-style string and arguments.

    Useful for delayed serialization of arguments for logging. Message string will not be constructed until the toString() method is called.
